# junctionType

**Instance Property**

A value that represents the type of junction associated with this maneuver.

## Declaration

```swift
var junctionType: CPJunctionType { get set }
```

## Discussion

One of the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPJunctionType] values that indicates the type of traffic junction; a [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPManeuver] requires this value.

## Providing junction information

- **junctionExitAngle**: The angle of the exit road of this junction.
- **junctionElementAngles**: A set of angles for the rest of the roads of this junction.
